DOC.brief_title: Level Physical Activities Patients Before After Breast Cancer Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Introduction : Breast cancer common malignant neoplasy woman . The risk breast cancer lifetime high among north-american woman , one eight , 66 % case occur menopause 15 % woman 40 year old . Published cohort study show clear evidence woman practice intense physical activity risk breast cancer reduce . The risk reduction woman 70 % , 10 % practice physical activity low level . During adolescence adult age , moderate intense physical activity may protect future breast cancer development . But question still need answer : Were woman breast carcinoma diagnosis already physically active life ? Were change physical activity treatment ? Why ? Objectives : The aim study identify level physical activity patient breast carcinoma treatment , observe change level activity . Subjects Methods : 303 patient already diagnosis breast cancer already treat Ambulatory Botucatu School Medicine select . The measure tool use level physical activity International Physical Activities Questionnaire ( IPAQ-short version ) , validate World Health Organization - Physical Activities Health International Committee ( 1998 ) .
